item.content:
Last Updated: December 16, 2025

Introduction

MDX Reader (“we”, “our”, or “the app”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our application.

Information We Collect

What We DON’T Collect

MDX Reader is designed with privacy in mind. We DO NOT:

  • Collect any personal information
  • Track your usage or behavior
  • Access your contacts, location, or photos
  • Use analytics or tracking services
  • Share any data with third parties
  • Require account creation or login
  • Connect to external servers

What We Store Locally

All data is stored locally on your device only:

  • Dictionary Files: MDX/MDD dictionary files you import
  • Search History: Words you’ve looked up (stored locally)
  • Favorites: Words you’ve bookmarked (stored locally)
  • App Settings: Your preferences (font size, theme, etc.)

How We Use Your Information

All data remains on your device and is used solely to:

  • Display dictionary definitions
  • Remember your search history for quick access
  • Save your favorite words
  • Apply your personalized settings

Data Storage & Security

  • All data is stored in your device’s local storage
  • No cloud synchronization or backup occurs
  • Data is protected by your device’s security features
  • You can delete all app data at any time through Settings

Third-Party Services

MDX Reader does not use any third-party services, including:

  • Analytics platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, Firebase)
  • Advertising networks
  • Social media integrations
  • Cloud storage services
  • Crash reporting tools

Your Rights

You have complete control over your data:

  • Access: View all locally stored data within the app
  • Delete: Clear search history, favorites, or all data through Settings
  • Export: Dictionary files remain accessible in your device’s file system
  • Uninstall: Deleting the app removes all associated data

Children’s Privacy

MDX Reader does not collect any personal information from anyone, including children under 13. The app is safe for all ages.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. Changes will be reflected with a new “Last Updated” date. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

Data Portability

Your dictionary files and data remain in standard formats:

  • MDX/MDD files: Industry-standard dictionary format
  • SQLite database: Standard database format for history and favorites

You can back up or transfer these files independently.

Summary

MDX Reader respects your privacy:

âœ… No data collection - We don’t collect personal information
âœ… No internet required - Works completely offline
âœ… No tracking - No analytics or user tracking
âœ… Local storage only - All data stays on your device
âœ… No third parties - No data sharing with anyone
âœ… Full control - You own and control all your data

This privacy policy is effective as of December 16, 2025.

English Version

1. Introduction

Thank you for choosing MDX Reader (“we,” “our,” or “the App”). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains our practices regarding data collection, use, and protection.

Important: MDX Reader is designed with privacy-first principles. We do NOT collect, store, transmit, or share any personal data.

2. Information We Do NOT Collect

MDX Reader operates entirely offline and does NOT collect any of the following:

2.1 Personal Information

  • âŒ Name, email address, or contact information
  • âŒ Account credentials (the App does not require login)
  • âŒ Location data
  • âŒ Device identifiers
  • âŒ IP addresses

2.2 Usage Data

  • âŒ Search queries or search history
  • âŒ Dictionary content accessed
  • âŒ Favorite words or bookmarks
  • âŒ App usage statistics
  • âŒ Analytics or tracking data

2.3 Technical Data

  • âŒ Crash reports
  • âŒ Performance metrics
  • âŒ Device information
  • âŒ System logs

3. Data Storage

All data generated by MDX Reader is stored locally on your device only:

3.1 Local Storage

  • Dictionary Files: Stored in the location you choose when importing
  • App Data: Stored in ~/Library/Application Support/MDX/
    • Search history (up to 30 entries)
    • Favorite words
    • App settings (theme, font, display preferences)
  • Access: Only accessible by you and the App

3.2 Data Control

  • You have complete control over your data
  • You can delete any data at any time through the App’s settings
  • Uninstalling the App removes all data permanently

4. How the App Works

MDX Reader is a 100% offline application:

4.1 No Network Connection

  • The App does not connect to the internet
  • No data is transmitted to our servers (we don’t have servers)
  • No third-party services are used
  • No analytics or tracking tools are integrated

4.2 File Access

  • The App only accesses files you explicitly select
  • MDX and MDD dictionary files are read for display purposes only
  • We do not modify, transmit, or share your dictionary files
  • File access is protected by macOS App Sandbox

5. Third-Party Services

MDX Reader does NOT use any third-party services, including:

  • âŒ Analytics services (e.g., Google Analytics, Mixpanel)
  • âŒ Advertising networks
  • âŒ Social media plugins
  • âŒ Cloud storage services
  • âŒ AI or machine learning services

6. Children’s Privacy

MDX Reader is suitable for users of all ages. Since we do not collect any personal information, there are no special provisions for children under 13.

7. Data Security

Although we don’t collect data, we implement security measures for local data:

  • App Sandbox: The App runs in macOS App Sandbox for security isolation
  • Local Encryption: Settings and data are stored using standard macOS security mechanisms
  • No Network Access: Zero risk of data breaches through network transmission

8. Your Rights

You have complete control over your data:

  • Access: View all your data within the App
  • Delete: Clear history, favorites, or all data in Settings
  • Export: Copy your favorite words manually (export feature planned)
  • Portability: All data is stored in standard formats

9. Changes to Privacy Policy

If we update this Privacy Policy, we will:

  • Update the “Last Updated” date
  • Notify users through App Store update notes
  • Never make changes that compromise your privacy

10. Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy:

  • Email: levi.duan.arts@gmail.com
  • Website: https://leviduan.github.io/

11. Compliance

MDX Reader complies with:

  • Apple App Store Review Guidelines
  • macOS App Sandbox requirements
  • General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) principles
  • California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) principles

item.title: FlipFocus - Product Documentation
item.description:
Product Overview

FlipFocus is a minimalist flip clock application with an integrated Pomodoro timer, designed to help users stay focused and productive. The app features a beautiful flip clock display, customizable themes, and seamless integration with iOS system features like Live Activity and Dynamic Island.

Target Users

User Type Use Case
Students Study timer, exam preparation, focus sessions
Remote Workers Work sprints, meeting countdowns, desk clock
Creatives Deep work sessions, distraction-free environment
General Users Bedside clock, aesthetic desk display

Core Features

1. Flip Clock Display

A classic flip clock with smooth page-turning animations.
item.content:
Product Overview

FlipFocus is a minimalist flip clock application with an integrated Pomodoro timer, designed to help users stay focused and productive. The app features a beautiful flip clock display, customizable themes, and seamless integration with iOS system features like Live Activity and Dynamic Island.

Target Users

User Type Use Case
Students Study timer, exam preparation, focus sessions
Remote Workers Work sprints, meeting countdowns, desk clock
Creatives Deep work sessions, distraction-free environment
General Users Bedside clock, aesthetic desk display

Core Features

1. Flip Clock Display

A classic flip clock with smooth page-turning animations.

Specifications:

  • Real-time clock display with hours and minutes
  • Smooth flip animation for digit transitions (1.5s duration)
  • Breathing colon animation (optional)
  • Auto-hide UI controls after 5 seconds of inactivity
  • Tap to reveal controls

Technical Details:

  • Animation: Custom SwiftUI flip animation using 3D rotation
  • Update frequency: 1 second interval
  • Font: System font with customizable weight and size

2. Pomodoro Timer

A productivity timer based on the Pomodoro Technique.

Timer Configuration:

Session Type Duration Color
Focus 25 minutes Red
Short Break 5 minutes Green
Long Break 15 minutes Green
Paused - Yellow

Cycle Structure:

Round 1: Focus (25m) â†’ Short Break (5m)
Round 2: Focus (25m) â†’ Short Break (5m)
Round 3: Focus (25m) â†’ Short Break (5m)
Round 4: Focus (25m) â†’ Long Break (15m)
â†’ Cycle repeats

Controls:

  • Play/Pause: Start or pause the current session
  • Reset: Return to initial state (Focus, 25:00)
  • Skip: Jump to the next session

Visual Indicators:

  • Circular progress ring showing remaining time
  • Round indicator dots (4 dots showing completed rounds)
  • State icon (flame for focus, leaf for break, pause for paused)

3. Live Activity & Dynamic Island

Real-time timer display on Lock Screen and Dynamic Island.

Supported Devices:

  • Live Activity: iPhone with iOS 16.1+
  • Dynamic Island: iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max, iPhone 15 series

Display Modes:

Mode Left Side Right Side
Compact State icon Progress ring
Expanded Icon + State text Round indicators
Minimal Progress ring -
Lock Screen Timer in ring State + Rounds

Data Sync:

  • Updates every second during active timer
  • Displays paused time when timer is paused
  • Ends automatically when timer is reset

4. Home Screen Widgets

Quick glance widgets for the Home Screen.

Widget Sizes:

Size Content Dimensions
Small Time display 155 x 155 pt
Medium Date + Time 329 x 155 pt

Features:

  • Light and dark mode support
  • Rounded font design
  • Monospaced digits for consistent layout
  • Updates every minute

5. Customization Options

Background Colors (16 options):

Category Colors
Blacks Pure Black, Charcoal, Dark Gray, Graphite
Blues Navy, Midnight, Ocean, Slate
Greens Dark Green, Forest
Browns Dark Brown, Espresso
Reds Dark Red, Wine
Purples Dark Purple, Plum

Adjustable Settings:

  • Clock font size (0.8x - 1.2x)
  • Clock digit opacity (50% - 100%)
  • Colon opacity (30% - 80%)
  • Colon breathing animation (on/off)
  • Pomodoro font size (0.8x - 1.2x)
  • Pomodoro opacity (50% - 100%)

6. Localization

Supported Languages (30):

Region Languages
East Asia Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Japanese, Korean
South Asia Hindi
Southeast Asia Indonesian, Malay, Thai, Vietnamese
Middle East Arabic, Hebrew, Turkish
Europe English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Czech, Romanian, Hungarian, Greek, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Finnish

Localized Content:

  • All UI text
  • Settings labels
  • Background color names
  • App name on Home Screen (via InfoPlist.strings)

User Flows

Flow 1: Basic Clock Usage

1. Open App â†’ Flip Clock displayed
2. Wait 5s â†’ Controls auto-hide
3. Tap screen â†’ Controls appear
4. Tap Settings â†’ Customize appearance
5. Swipe left â†’ Switch to Pomodoro

Flow 2: Pomodoro Session

1. Swipe to Pomodoro view
2. Tap Play â†’ Timer starts (25:00)
3. Live Activity appears on Lock Screen
4. Timer counts down
5. At 0:00 â†’ Haptic feedback â†’ Auto-switch to Break
6. Complete 4 rounds â†’ Long Break
7. Tap Reset â†’ Return to initial state

Flow 3: Widget Setup

1. Long press Home Screen â†’ Edit mode
2. Tap + â†’ Search "FlipFocus"
3. Select widget size (Small/Medium)
4. Place widget â†’ Done

Technical Architecture

Project Structure

FashionClock/
â”œâ”€â”€ FashionClock/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ FashionClockApp.swift      # App entry point
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ContentView.swift           # Main container view
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Views/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ FlipClockView.swift     # Flip clock display
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ FlipDigitView.swift     # Single digit with animation
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ PomodoroView.swift      # Pomodoro timer
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Models/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Settings.swift          # App settings (ObservableObject)
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ PomodoroTimer.swift     # Timer logic
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ LiveActivityManager.swift # Live Activity control
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Ads/
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ AdManager.swift         # Google AdMob integration
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Resources/
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ [30 language].lproj/    # Localization files
â”‚
â””â”€â”€ FlipFocusWidget/
    â”œâ”€â”€ FlipFocusWidget.swift       # Home Screen widget
    â”œâ”€â”€ FlipFocusWidgetLiveActivity.swift # Live Activity UI
    â””â”€â”€ FlipFocusWidgetBundle.swift # Widget bundle

Key Technologies

Technology Usage
SwiftUI All UI components
ActivityKit Live Activity & Dynamic Island
WidgetKit Home Screen widgets
Combine Reactive data binding
UserDefaults Settings persistence
Google AdMob Monetization
UMP SDK GDPR consent management

Minimum Requirements

Requirement Value
iOS Version 16.0+
Widget Extension iOS 17.0+
Live Activity iOS 16.2+
Dynamic Island iPhone 14 Pro+

Monetization

Ad Strategy

Ad Type Placement First Day
Banner Settings page bottom Shown
Interstitial After closing Settings Hidden
Rewarded Future feature Hidden

First Day Policy:

  • Banner ads: Always shown
  • Interstitial ads: Hidden for first 24 hours after install
  • Improves user experience and retention

Ad Networks

  • Google AdMob (primary)
  • SKAdNetwork integration for attribution

Privacy & Compliance

Data Collection

Data Type Collected Purpose
Device ID Yes (AdMob) Advertising
Usage Data Yes (AdMob) Analytics
Personal Data No -
Location No -

Compliance

  • GDPR: UMP SDK for consent management
  • CCPA: Supported via UMP SDK
  • ATT: App Tracking Transparency implemented
  • COPPA: Not targeted at children (4+ rating)

Version History

Version 1.0.0 (Initial Release)

Features:

  • Flip clock with smooth animations
  • Pomodoro timer (25/5/15 min)
  • Live Activity & Dynamic Island support
  • Home Screen widgets (Small, Medium)
  • 16 background color options
  • 30 language support
  • Google AdMob integration
  • Accessibility support (VoiceOver)

Future Roadmap

Version Planned Features
1.1 Custom timer durations, Sound notifications
1.2 Apple Watch app
1.3 Statistics & history tracking
1.4 iCloud sync, Multiple timer presets

Support Information

Resource Link
Email levi.duan.arts@gmail.com
App Store https://apps.apple.com/app/id6756367564

item.content:
Privacy Policy for EchoTalk

Last Updated: December 24, 2025

Introduction

EchoTalk (“we”, “our”, or “us”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

Information We Collect

Information You Provide

  • Voice Recordings: Your voice recordings are processed locally on your device for speech recognition and translation purposes.
  • Translation History: Conversation history is stored locally on your device only.
  • Custom Avatars: Profile pictures you upload are stored locally on your device.
  • App Settings: Your preferences and settings are saved locally.

Automatically Collected Information

  • Device Information: We may collect basic device information for app functionality (iOS version, device model).
  • Crash Reports: Anonymous crash reports to help us improve app stability.

How We Use Your Information

We use the collected information to:

  • Provide speech recognition and translation services
  • Save your conversation history locally
  • Customize your app experience
  • Improve app performance and fix bugs

Data Storage and Security

  • Local Storage: All personal data (recordings, history, avatars) is stored exclusively on your device.
  • No Cloud Backup: We do not store your data on our servers.
  • Data Encryption: Sensitive data is protected using iOS security features.

Third-Party Services

We use the following third-party services:

Google Translate API

  • Purpose: Text translation
  • Data Shared: Text to be translated (no personal identifiers)
  • Privacy Policy: Google Privacy Policy

Google AdMob (Optional)

  • Purpose: Display advertisements (if ads not removed via in-app purchase)
  • Data Collected: Device identifiers, usage data
  • Privacy Policy: AdMob Privacy Policy
  • Opt-out: Purchase “Remove Ads” to disable all advertising

StoreKit (Apple)

  • Purpose: In-app purchases
  • Data Handled: Apple manages all payment information
  • Privacy Policy: Apple Privacy Policy

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access: View all data stored in the app
  • Delete: Remove all conversation history and recordings
  • Export: Share your recordings via iOS share sheet
  • Opt-out: Disable features you don’t want to use

Children’s Privacy

EchoTalk is suitable for users of all ages. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. The app does not require account creation or personal information submission.

Permissions

The app requires the following permissions:

  • Microphone: Required for voice recording and speech recognition
  • Speech Recognition: Required to convert speech to text
  • Photos (Optional): To upload custom avatars

You can manage these permissions in iOS Settings at any time.

Data Retention

  • Conversation History: Retained until you manually delete it
  • Voice Recordings: Stored until you delete them
  • Settings: Retained until you uninstall the app

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by updating the “Last Updated” date. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

International Users

EchoTalk is available worldwide. Your data is processed locally on your device and is subject to the privacy laws of your jurisdiction.

Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

  • Email: support@echotalk.app
  • App: Settings â†’ About â†’ Privacy Policy

Compliance

This Privacy Policy complies with:

  • Apple App Store Review Guidelines
  • General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
  • California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
  • Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA)

Your Privacy Matters

Product Overview

Last Updated: December 2025

English Version

This Terms of Service should be read together with our Privacy Policy.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By downloading, installing, or using SG BusNow! (“the App”), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the App.

2. Description of Service

SG BusNow! is a public transport companion app for Singapore that provides:

  • Real-time bus arrival information
  • MRT/LRT route planning
  • Nearby stops discovery
  • Trip tracking and navigation
  • Arrival alerts and notifications

3. Data Sources

The App uses data from:

  • LTA DataMall: Real-time bus arrival and route information
  • OneMap: Map and route planning services

All transport data is owned and provided by their respective providers. We do not create or modify transport data.

We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of this data. The actual bus arrival times may differ from the information displayed.

4. Use of the App

You agree to:

  • Use the App only for personal, non-commercial purposes
  • Not attempt to reverse engineer, modify, or distribute the App
  • Not use the App in any way that violates applicable laws
  • Not interfere with or disrupt the App’s functionality

5. Location Permission Use

The App may request access to your device location in order to show nearby bus stops and plan routes. Location data is processed only on-device and is not stored on our servers. You can control location permissions through your device settings at any time.

6. Advertisements

The App displays advertisements provided by Google AdMob. By using the App, you acknowledge that:

  • Ads may be personalized based on your device information
  • You can opt-out of personalized ads via App Tracking Transparency
  • Ad content is provided by third parties and we are not responsible for it

7. In-App Purchases

The App offers an optional “Remove Ads” purchase. All purchases are:

  • Final and non-refundable (except as required by law)
  • Processed through Apple’s App Store
  • Subject to Apple’s terms and conditions

8. Disclaimer of Warranties

THE APP IS PROVIDED “AS IS” WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO:

  • Accuracy of bus arrival times
  • Availability of the service
  • Fitness for a particular purpose
  • Non-infringement

9. Limitation of Liability

TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR:

  • Any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
  • Loss arising from reliance on information provided by the App
  • Missed buses or transportation delays
  • Any damages exceeding the amount you paid for the App (if any)

10. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

11. Severability

If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that these Terms will otherwise remain in full force and effect.

12. Entire Agreement

These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding the use of the App and supersede all prior agreements and understandings.

13. Governing Law

These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Singapore.

14. Contact

For questions about these Terms, contact us at: levi.duan.arts@gmail.com

11. Severability

1. English

Privacy Policy

Last Updated: December 10, 2025

Introduction

Welcome to FlipFocus (“we,” “our,” or “us”). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application FlipFocus (the “App”).

By using the App, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

Information We Collect

Data Collected by FlipFocus

FlipFocus does not collect any personal data directly. We do not collect, store, or transmit:

  • Personal identification information (name, email, phone number)
  • Location data
  • Contacts or address book information
  • Photos or media files
  • Health or fitness data
  • Financial information
  • User-generated content

Data Collected by Third-Party Services

However, third-party advertising services integrated into our App may collect certain information automatically. Specifically, Google AdMob may collect the following data:

Data Type Purpose Collected By
Device Identifier (IDFA) Personalized advertising, cross-app ad tracking, ad performance measurement Google AdMob
IP Address Fraud prevention, approximate location for ad targeting, analytics Google AdMob
Device Information Ad optimization, device compatibility Google AdMob
App Usage Data Analytics, ad frequency capping Google AdMob

Important: Device identifiers may be used to deliver personalized ads across apps and websites, and to measure advertising performance. This data is collected and processed by Google, not by FlipFocus.

Information Stored Locally

The following data is stored only on your device and is never transmitted to any server:

  • App settings and preferences
  • Timer configurations
  • Display customization options

How Your Information Is Used

The data collected by third-party services is used for the following purposes:

  1. Advertising: To display relevant advertisements within the App
  2. Cross-App Tracking: To deliver personalized ads across different apps and measure ad effectiveness
  3. Analytics: To understand how users interact with the App
  4. Fraud Prevention: To detect and prevent fraudulent activity

Third-Party Services

Our App integrates with the following third-party services:

Google AdMob

We use Google AdMob to display advertisements. AdMob collects and processes data according to Google’s Privacy Policy. This includes:

  • Device Identifiers: May be used to deliver personalized ads across apps and measure ad performance
  • IP Address: Collected by Google for fraud prevention and approximate geographic targeting
  • Usage Data: Collected to optimize ad delivery and frequency

All advertising data is collected, processed, and stored by Google according to their privacy practices. FlipFocus does not have access to or control over this data.

  • Google Privacy Policy: https://policies.google.com/privacy

Apple Services

We integrate with Apple’s system features:

  • WidgetKit: For Home Screen widgets (no data collection)
  • ActivityKit: For Live Activities (no data collection)

These Apple services do not collect or transmit any personal data.

Advertising and Your Choices

Personalized Advertising

By default, ads may be personalized based on your interests and activity across apps. Device identifiers may be used for cross-app advertising tracking.

You can opt out of personalized advertising and tracking:

  1. iOS Settings: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Tracking > Turn off “Allow Apps to Request to Track”
  2. In-App Consent: When prompted by the App Tracking Transparency dialog, tap “Ask App Not to Track”
  3. Reset Advertising Identifier: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Apple Advertising > Reset Advertising Identifier

Non-Personalized Ads

If you opt out of tracking, you will still see ads, but they will not be personalized based on your activity.

Children’s Privacy

FlipFocus is rated 4+ and is suitable for all ages. However:

  • We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 years of age
  • We do not share any children’s data with third parties for advertising purposes
  • The third-party advertising SDK (Google AdMob) is configured to comply with applicable children’s privacy laws
  • If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child’s data has been collected inappropriately, please contact us immediately

We comply with the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) and similar regulations worldwide.

Data Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:

  • All data transmission uses secure protocols (HTTPS/TLS)
  • Local data is stored using iOS secure storage mechanisms
  • We do not operate servers that store your personal data
  • Third-party services use industry-standard security practices

Data Retention

  • Local Data: Stored on your device until you delete the App or clear App data
  • Advertising Data: All collected advertising data is managed by Google AdMob according to their data retention policies. FlipFocus does not retain any advertising data.

Data Storage

FlipFocus does not operate any servers that store user data. All advertising data collected through the App is stored and managed by the respective third-party providers (Google) according to their privacy policies and data retention practices.

Your Rights

Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

For All Users

  • Opt-Out of Tracking: Disable ad tracking via iOS Settings
  • Delete Local Data: Uninstall the App to remove all locally stored data
  • Reset Advertising ID: Reset your device’s advertising identifier

For EU/EEA Users (GDPR)

  • Right to access your data
  • Right to rectification
  • Right to erasure (“right to be forgotten”)
  • Right to restrict processing
  • Right to data portability
  • Right to object to processing

For data held by Google, please refer to Google’s Privacy Policy for exercising these rights.

For California Users (CCPA)

  • Right to know what personal information is collected
  • Right to delete personal information
  • Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (we do not sell data)
  • Right to non-discrimination

International Data Transfers

If you are located outside the United States, please note that data collected by Google AdMob may be transferred to and processed in the United States or other countries where Google operates servers.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by:

  • Posting the new Privacy Policy in the App
  • Updating the “Last Updated” date at the top of this document

We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact us:

Email: levi.duan.arts@gmail.com

Summary

Category Details
Direct Data Collection None
Third-Party Data Collection Yes (Google AdMob)
Cross-App Tracking Yes (opt-out available)
Children’s Data Not collected or shared

This Privacy Policy is effective as of December 10, 2025.

Datenschutzrichtlinie

Letzte Aktualisierung: 10. Dezember 2025

Einleitung

Willkommen bei FlipFocus (“wir”, “uns” oder “unser”). Wir respektieren Ihre Privatsphare und verpflichten uns zum Schutz Ihrer personenbezogenen Daten. Diese Datenschutzrichtlinie erlautert, wie wir Ihre Informationen erfassen, verwenden und schutzen, wenn Sie unsere mobile Anwendung FlipFocus (die “App”) nutzen.

Durch die Nutzung der App stimmen Sie der Erfassung und Verwendung von Informationen gemaÃŸ dieser Datenschutzrichtlinie zu.

Informationen, die wir erfassen

Von FlipFocus erfasste Daten

FlipFocus erfasst keine personenbezogenen Daten direkt. Wir erfassen, speichern oder ubertragen nicht:

  • Personliche Identifikationsinformationen (Name, E-Mail, Telefonnummer)
  • Standortdaten
  • Kontakt- oder Adressbuchinformationen
  • Fotos oder Mediendateien
  • Gesundheits- oder Fitnessdaten
  • Finanzinformationen
  • Benutzergenerierte Inhalte

Von Drittanbieterdiensten erfasste Daten

Allerdings konnen in unsere App integrierte Werbedienste von Drittanbietern bestimmte Informationen automatisch erfassen. Insbesondere kann Google AdMob folgende Daten erfassen:

Wichtig: Geratekennungen konnen verwendet werden, um personalisierte Werbung uber Apps und Websites hinweg zu liefern und die Werbeleistung zu messen. Diese Daten werden von Google, nicht von FlipFocus, erfasst und verarbeitet.

Werbung und Ihre Wahlmoglichkeiten

Sie konnen personalisierte Werbung und Tracking ablehnen:

  1. iOS-Einstellungen: Gehen Sie zu Einstellungen > Datenschutz & Sicherheit > Tracking > “Apps erlauben, Tracking anzufordern” deaktivieren
  2. In-App-Zustimmung: Wenn das App-Tracking-Transparenz-Dialogfeld erscheint, tippen Sie auf “App auffordern, nicht zu tracken”

Datenschutz von Kindern

FlipFocus ist mit 4+ bewertet und fur alle Altersgruppen geeignet. Wir erfassen wissentlich keine personlichen Informationen von Kindern unter 13 Jahren und teilen keine Kinderdaten mit Dritten fur Werbezwecke.

Kontaktieren Sie uns

Wenn Sie Fragen zu dieser Datenschutzrichtlinie haben, kontaktieren Sie uns bitte:

Informazioni che raccogliamo

Dati raccolti da FlipFocus

FlipFocus non raccoglie direttamente alcun dato personale. Non raccogliamo, memorizziamo o trasmettiamo:

SG BusNow! (“we”, “our”, or “the App”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

Information We Collect

1. Location Information

  • What We Collect: App interactions, feature usage patterns, crash reports

  • Storage: Stored locally on your device only

English Version

Introduction

SG BusNow! (“we”, “our”, or “the App”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

Information We Collect

1. Location Information

  • When Collected: Only when you actively use features that require location (e.g., finding nearby stops, trip tracking)
  • Purpose: To show nearby bus stops/MRT stations and provide real-time trip tracking
  • Storage: Location data is processed locally on your device and is not stored on our servers
  • Background Location: Used only during active trip tracking to provide arrival notifications. You can disable this in Settings.

2. Usage Data

  • What We Collect: App interactions, feature usage patterns, crash reports
  • Purpose: To improve app performance and user experience
  • Third-Party Analytics: We use Google AdMob which may collect anonymous usage data

3. Saved Preferences

  • What We Collect: Favorite stops, saved routes, language preferences, theme settings
  • Storage: Stored locally on your device only
  • Sync: This data is not synced to any cloud service

Third-Party Services

Google AdMob

We use Google AdMob to display advertisements. AdMob may collect:

  • Device identifiers (with your consent via App Tracking Transparency)
  • IP address
  • General location (city-level)
  • App usage data

For more information, see Google’s Privacy Policy

LTA DataMall API

We use Singapore’s Land Transport Authority (LTA) DataMall API to fetch real-time bus arrival and route information. This is public transport data and does not involve personal information.

OneMap API

We use Singapore’s OneMap API for route planning and map services. No personal data is shared with this service.

Data Sharing

We do NOT:

  • Sell your personal data to third parties
  • Share your location history with anyone
  • Store your data on external servers
  • Create user profiles or accounts

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Disable Location: Turn off location services for this app in your device Settings
  • Opt-out of Tracking: Deny tracking permission when prompted (iOS 14.5+)
  • Delete Local Data: Uninstall the app to remove all locally stored data
  • Disable Notifications: Turn off notifications in device Settings

Children’s Privacy

This app is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures:

  • All API communications use HTTPS encryption

item.description:
Singapore’s Smartest Public Transport Companion

ğŸ¯ The Problem We Solve

Every Day in Singapore, Commuters Face These Challenges:

“Will I miss my stop?”
Unlike MRT trains, Singapore buses don’t announce stops. Foreign tourists and even locals often miss their destination, especially on unfamiliar routes.

“When will my bus actually arrive?”
Bus stop displays show estimated times, but they’re not always accurate. Commuters waste time waiting or rush unnecessarily.

“How do I get there?”
Planning trips across multiple transport modes (bus + MRT + walking) is complex. Most apps only show one mode at a time.
item.content:
Singapore’s Smartest Public Transport Companion

ğŸ¯ The Problem We Solve

Every Day in Singapore, Commuters Face These Challenges:

“Will I miss my stop?”
Unlike MRT trains, Singapore buses don’t announce stops. Foreign tourists and even locals often miss their destination, especially on unfamiliar routes.

“When will my bus actually arrive?”
Bus stop displays show estimated times, but they’re not always accurate. Commuters waste time waiting or rush unnecessarily.

“How do I get there?”
Planning trips across multiple transport modes (bus + MRT + walking) is complex. Most apps only show one mode at a time.

“Where are the nearby stops?”
New residents and tourists struggle to find bus stops and understand which services to take.

âœ¨ Introducing SG BusNow!

Your AI-Powered Transport Assistant

SG BusNow! is the ultimate companion for navigating Singapore’s public transport system. With real-time data, intelligent route planning, and smart arrival alerts, we make every journey effortless and stress-free.

ğŸ† Winner Features

ğŸ”” Never Miss Your Stop Again
Our unique “Smart Stop Alert” uses GPS tracking to notify you exactly 1 stop before your destination. With vibration, sound, and visual alerts, you’ll never miss your stop again.

â±ï¸ Real-Time Arrivals You Can Trust
Live arrival times for all 5,000+ bus stops island-wide, powered by official LTA data. See the next 3 buses with wheelchair accessibility information.

ğŸ—ºï¸ One-Tap Journey Planning
Planning a trip? Just enter your destination. We’ll calculate the best route combining buses, MRT, and walking - with fare estimates and journey time.

ğŸ“ Live Trip Tracking
Track your journey in real-time on an interactive map. See exactly where you are on the route, how many stops remaining, and when you’ll arrive.

â­ Your Personal Transport Hub
Save your favorite stops, routes, and destinations. Quick access from the home screen widget means your commute is just one tap away.

ğŸŒ Designed for Everyone
Available in 6 languages: English, ç®€ä½“ä¸­æ–‡, Bahasa Melayu, à®¤à®®à®¿à®´à¯, æ—¥æœ¬èª, í•œêµ­ì–´. Perfect for locals, expats, and tourists.

ğŸ¨ Beautiful by Design

Modern Interface, Effortless Experience

Dark Mode Native
Stunning dark theme reduces eye strain during night commutes. Automatic switching based on system settings or manual control.

Gradient Design System
Beautiful purple-to-blue gradients create a premium, modern feel. Every screen is crafted with attention to detail.

Intuitive Navigation
Clean, simple interface that anyone can use. Large buttons, clear labels, and logical flow make navigation effortless.

Smooth Animations
Delightful micro-interactions and smooth transitions make every tap feel responsive and premium.

ğŸšŒ Core Features

1. Real-Time Bus Arrivals

See What’s Coming, Right Now

  • Live Updates: Arrival times update every 20 seconds
  • Next 3 Buses: See all upcoming buses at once
  • Bus Capacity: Know if the bus is crowded before it arrives
  • Wheelchair Info: Accessibility information for every bus
  • Service Details: Full route information and operating hours

Use Case:
“It’s 8:45 AM. You need to catch the 190 bus. Open SG BusNow!, see it’s arriving in 3 minutes, and leave your flat at the perfect time.”

2. MRT & LRT Network Hub

Complete MRT System at Your Fingertips

  • 9 MRT/LRT Lines: Coverage of entire Singapore network

    • East-West Line (Green)
    • North-South Line (Red)
    • Circle Line (Yellow)
    • Downtown Line (Blue)
    • Thomson-East Coast Line (Brown)
    • North-East Line (Purple)
    • Bukit Panjang LRT (Grey)
    • Sengkang LRT (Grey)
    • Punggol LRT (Grey)

  • Station Details: Exit information, first/last train times

  • Service Alerts: Real-time disruption updates

  • Interactive Map: Visual network map with station search

  • Line-Specific Themes: Each line has its authentic color

Use Case:
“You’re at Orchard. Going to Changi Airport. MRT Hub shows you: Take Red Line to Tanah Merah, transfer to Green Line. 45 minutes total.”

3. Multi-Modal Trip Planning

The Smartest Way to Get Around

How It Works:

  1. Enter Destination - Type any address or place name
  2. See Route Options - Multiple routes with different combinations
  3. Choose Your Route - Compare by time, transfers, or walking distance
  4. Start Trip - One tap begins live tracking

Route Details Include:

  • Total journey time
  • Number of transfers
  • Walking distance and duration
  • Bus numbers and MRT lines
  • Fare estimate (coming soon)
  • Step-by-step instructions

Example Route:

Home â†’ Vivocity (35 minutes)
â”œâ”€ Walk 5 min to Bus Stop 12345
â”œâ”€ Bus 100 (8 stops, 12 min)
â”œâ”€ Walk 2 min to Harbourfront MRT
â”œâ”€ MRT Circle Line (3 stops, 8 min)
â””â”€ Walk 3 min to destination

Use Case:
“Meeting friends at Marina Bay Sands. One tap shows 3 route options. You choose the fastest: Bus + MRT combo. 28 minutes door-to-door.”

4. Smart Stop Alerts

Our Signature Feature - Never Miss Your Stop

The Problem:
Singapore buses don’t announce stops. Tourists and locals alike miss their destination, especially when unfamiliar with the route or distracted by their phone.

Our Solution:
GPS-based proximity detection with multiple alert types:

Alert Triggers:

  • 2 Stops Away: Heads up notification
  • 1 Stop Away: Strong alert (vibration + sound + visual)
  • Destination Reached: Confirmation notification

Alert Modes:

  • ğŸ”Š Sound Alert: Clear “Next stop!” announcement
  • ğŸ“³ Vibration: Strong haptic feedback
  • ğŸ“± Visual Alert: Full-screen notification
  • ğŸŒ™ Silent Mode: Visual only for quiet environments

Smart Features:

  • Works in background (app closed)
  • Battery optimized
  • Accurate to within 50 meters
  • Adapts to bus speed

Use Case:
“You’re on Bus 170 reading a book. GPS detects you’re 1 stop away. Phone vibrates strongly, shows ‘Next Stop: Orchard Road.’ You press the stop button. Perfect.”

5. Live Trip Tracking

See Your Journey Unfold in Real-Time

During Your Trip:

  • Interactive Map: Your position updates every 5 seconds
  • Progress Timeline: Visual indicator showing completed and upcoming stops
  • Dynamic Updates: “Next stop in 2 minutes” countdown
  • Arrival Prediction: Estimated arrival time at destination

Multi-Segment Support:

  • Track bus segments
  • Track MRT segments
  • Walking navigation between transfers
  • Seamless transitions between modes

Trip Information:

  • Current segment (e.g., “On Bus 190”)
  • Stops remaining
  • Next stop name
  • Time to destination
  • Transfer instructions when approaching

Use Case:
“First time taking this route. Map shows exactly where you are. Timeline highlights your current position. You can relax knowing the app is watching.”

6. Nearby Stops Discovery

Find Stops Around You Instantly

Features:

  • Service List: See which buses serve each stop
  • Map View: Visual layout of all nearby stops
  • Quick Actions: One tap to see arrivals

Smart Sorting:

  • By distance (closest first)
  • By stop type (bus/MRT)
  • By number of services

Use Case:
“New office location, first day. Open Nearby Stops. See 3 bus stops within 200m. Find one serving your home route. Save it to favorites.”

7. Favorites & Quick Access

Your Commute, One Tap Away

  • Saved Routes: Complete door-to-door journeys

  • Quick trip start button

Smart Features:

  • Group favorites by category
  • Sync across devices (coming soon)

Use Case:
“Every morning: Check widget â†’ See Bus 190 in 5 min â†’ Leave house. Every evening: One tap ‘Go Home’ â†’ Navigation starts.”

8. Bus Route Explorer

Understand Singapore’s Bus Network

Complete Route Information:

  • Full Route Map: Interactive map showing entire route
  • All Stops Listed: Both directions with stop codes
  • Operating Hours: First and last bus times
  • Service Type: Express, trunk, feeder, night bus
  • Operator: SBS Transit, SMRT, etc.
  • Loop Routes: Clearly marked circular routes

Visual Timeline:

  • See all stops in order
  • Tap any stop to see arrivals
  • Distance between stops
  • Current bus positions (when tracking)

Use Case:
“Thinking of taking a new bus. Open Route Explorer. See it passes through Orchard and Marina Bay. Perfect for weekend trips. Add to favorites.”

9. Intelligent Search

Find Anything, Fast

Unified Search Bar: Type once, find everything:

  • Bus Stops: By name, code, or road
  • Bus Services: By number
  • MRT Stations: By name or code
  • Places: “Changi Airport,” “Marina Bay Sands”
  • Addresses: Full Singapore addresses

Smart Features:

  • Instant Results: As you type
  • Fuzzy Matching: “ochard” finds “Orchard”
  • Recent Searches: Quick access to history
  • Popular Destinations: Trending searches
  • Multilingual: Search in any supported language

Search Examples:

  • “190” â†’ Finds Bus Service 190
  • “Orchard” â†’ Shows stops on Orchard Road + Orchard MRT
  • “airport” â†’ Changi Airport + buses + MRT route

“Friend says ‘Meet at Vivo.’ Type ‘vivo’ â†’ See Vivocity, HarbourFront MRT, nearby bus stops. Pick one â†’ Get directions.”
